title: Roasted Asparagus with Parmesan Cheese
ingredients: 1 tablespoon olive oil (note its divided use)
instructions: Preheat the oven to 450ยบ F.
Place the asparagus on a baking pan and drizzle it with 1 to 2 teaspoons of olive oil.  Toss the asparagus to coat it with the oil.
Combine the cheese, bread crumbs, and melted margarine (or butter).  Sprinkle the asparagus with the cheese mixture then drizzle them with the remaining olive oil.
Bake the asparagus, uncovered, until they are just tender, about 15 minutes.
source: The Right way to Grill Chicken, Texas Taste Section, The Dallas Morning News.
